About.Name: Gabriel da Silva Fernandes
About.Text: I am a web developer based in São Paulo, Brazil, and I started my journey at the college of Information Technology Management in 2022. I began with a focus on frontend development, creating intuitive and responsive interfaces, and over time, I delved into backend technologies to become a full stack developer. This portfolio reflects my journey, highlighting my skills and experiences on both sides of web development.

Items.Name: SalãoCondo Resident
Items.Description: This is the SalãoCondo project for residents, which allows them to register and log in, access the reservation calendar, make reservations, and manage the guest list.

Items.Name: SalãoCondo Administrator
Items.Description: This is the SalãoCondo project for administrators. It allows for resident management and payment status control, which must be up to date for reservations to be made. Additionally, it offers reservation management, access to the guest list, and a dashboard with insights.

Items.Name: English Cast
Items.Description: This is my English Cast project where you can publish English audio, access audio published by other users, listen to them, manage them in your playlists, and improve your English skills. The audios are classified by English proficiency levels.

Items.Name: New Tech TVS
Items.Description: NewTech TVS is a landing page developed for a television repair service. The project features contact links, information about the services offered, and customer reviews.

Items.Name: Wpp Link
Items.Description: Wpp Link is a simple project developed to create a link for sharing WhatsApp contacts.

Certificates.Name: Extreme English
Certificates.Description: Improving my English is one of my life goals. This course was crucial in opening doors to the language. Thanks to it, I faced the challenge of learning English, acquired basic and intermediate knowledge, and have already started taking more advanced courses.

Certificates.Name: Tailwind CSS from Zero to Advanced
Certificates.Description: Deciding to learn Tailwind CSS was one of the best choices I made. Tailwind is amazing and allows for agile and organized styling. The course is top-notch, and Matheus Fraga's teaching is excellent.

Certificates.Name: PRO FIGMA | UI DESIGN
Certificates.Description: One of the major challenges in creating an application is understanding how to position items and design a beautiful and functional layout. With this course, I learned layout rules and how to use Figma for prototyping, which allows me to save time during development.

Certificates.Name: NodeJS, React, React Native, TypeScript
Certificates.Description: This course was fundamental to my growth, as it not only taught me TypeScript but also covered frameworks and Node.js. It enabled me to develop fullstack projects. With the knowledge gained, I reached a new level of skills and was able to create more complex projects, understanding how CRUD operations and data manipulation work on the frontend.

Certificates.Name: Web Frontend Fundamentals HTML CSS JS
Certificates.Description: This was my first course focused on front-end development. The course includes many detailed lessons on the three main technologies for web development. It provided me with the opportunity to learn how web pages are created and how to develop them.
